title: Gross premiums written by leading reinsurers in the U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Insurer in the x axis and Amount in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Amount in billion U.S. dollars 27.12 is found at Insurer National Indemnity Company and the minimum is found at EMC Reinsurance Company where Insurer is 0.16.
The difference of Amount in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Insurer is 26.96.
min_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Insurer, and Amount in billion U.S. dollars in each Insurer on the y axis.
Insurer National Indemnity Company has the highest Amount in billion U.S. dollars and EMC Reinsurance Company has the lowest Amount in billion U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Insurer in the x axis and Amount in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Amount in billion U.S. dollars 27.12 is found at Insurer National Indemnity Company and the minimum is found at EMC Reinsurance Company where Insurer is 0.16.
The difference of Amount in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Insurer is 26.96.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount in billion U.S. dollars for 17 number of Insurers.
Insurer National Indemnity Company has the highest Amount in billion U.S. dollars and EMC Reinsurance Company has the lowest Amount in billion U.S. dollars.
The difference of Amount in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Insurer is 26.96.

The Insurer National Indemnity Company has the highest Amount in billion U.S. dollars, followed by Everest Reinsurance Company, and Munich Re America Corp.. Down to the Insurer EMC Reinsurance Company which is the lowest.
The Insurer EMC Reinsurance Company tends to be 6.9 percent lower than average.
The Amount in billion U.S. dollars is 66.77 if we add up values of all Insurers.

data.Insurer: Partner Reinsurance Company of the U.S.
